LanguageData.NECForgeSteel.label: forge iron into steel
LanguageData.NECForgeSteel.description: Forge iron ore into hardened workable steel with a little coal or charcoal.
LanguageData.NECForgeSteelBulk.label: forge 100 iron into steel
LanguageData.NECForgeSteelBulk.description: Forge lots of iron ore into hardened workable steel with a little coal or charcoal.
LanguageData.NECForgeSteelBulk.jobString: Refining bulk steel from iron ore.
LanguageData.NECForgeSteelBulker.label: forge 500 iron into steel
LanguageData.NECForgeSteelBulker.description: Forge a ton of iron ore into hardened workable steel with a little coal or charcoal.
LanguageData.NECForgeSteelBulker.jobString: Refining a ton of steel from iron ore.
LanguageData.NECForgeSteelMoreBulker.label: forge 1000 iron into steel
LanguageData.NECForgeSteelMoreBulker.description: Forge a ton of iron ore into hardened workable steel with a little coal or charcoal.
LanguageData.NECForgeSteelMoreBulker.jobString: Refining a ton of steel from iron ore.
